SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Public admin class This class contains the logic and the attributes of the Admin The principal function of the admin is add the people which is going to vote in the program Add Songs or delete them from the program.
AdminLogic
The AdminLogic class manages the business logic for administrator-related operations.
AdminScreen
The AdminScreen class represents the graphical user interface for the admin user.
Bachata
The Bachata class represents the bachata genre in the music library.
DataContainer
DataContainer class represents a container for storing data related to users and songs.
DefaultSetUp
The DefaultSetUp class is responsible for setting up the default configuration of the application, including adding users and songs to the system.
Genre
The Genre class represents a musical genre in the music library.
InvalidCredentialsException
Exception thrown to indicate that the provided credentials are invalid.
LoginLogic
The LoginLogic class handles the logic for user authentication and login.
LoginScreen
The LoginScreen class represents the graphical user interface for the login screen.
Main
The Main class is the entry point of the application.
Merengue
The Merengue class represents the Merengue genre in the music library.
MusicLibrary
The MusicLibrary class represents the music library that stores songs organized by genre.
My_Utils
Utility class for printing messages and alerts.
Reggaeton
The Reggaeton class represents the Reggaeton genre.
Salsa
The Salsa class represents the Salsa genre.
Samba
The Samba class represents the Samba genre.
SerializationUtils
 
SetUp
The SetUp class is responsible for initializing the application setup.
Song
The Song class represents a song.
SongManagement
The SongManagement interface defines methods for managing songs.
User
The User class represents a user in the system.
UserLogic
The UserLogic class contains the logic for user-related actions in the application.
UserManagement
Interface for user management.
UserScreen
The UserScreen class represents the graphical user interface for the voter user.
Voter
Public class Voter This class is in charge of voting and containing the user instances in our application It uses a Set to be able to know if the user has already voted for the respective song.
